thread.title: Mitsubishi Motors Reports Nineteenth Consecutive Month Of Year-Over-Year Sales Increases
thread.title_full: Mitsubishi Motors Reports Nineteenth Consecutive Month Of Year-Over-Year Sales Increases - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Mitsubishi Motors Reports Nineteenth Consecutive Month Of Year-Over-Year Sales Increases
text:
Mitsubishi Motors North America, Inc.
- Total September sales up 35.9 percent year-over-year and marked the sixth straight month of double-digit sales increases
- New Outlander showing unprecedented demand at dealerships; reports best September since 2003
- Outlander Sport has its best-ever September
CYPRESS, Calif. , Oct. 1, Mitsubishi Motors North America, Inc . (MMNA) reported September 2015 sales of 7,556, an increase of 35.9 percent from September 2014 . Not only is this the brand's 19 th consecutive month of year-over-year sales increases, but it is also the sixth consecutive month of double-digit sales increases and the best September for the brand since 2007. Year-to-date sales are up 25.5 percent over the same period in 2014.
Leading the way in September was the Outlander Sport, reporting its best-ever September sales month with 3,140 units sold. The new 2016 Outlander, which features over 100 improvements, recorded 1,949 units sold, its best September in 12 years. The Mirage also saw a strong month, selling 1,348 units.
"Our sales momentum carried through in September and it's a result of having a strong product lineup," said Don Swearingen , executive vice president, MMNA. "Our record sales streak is not based on gimmicks, but rather consumer demand for our vehicles. In its first full month on sale, our dealers are reporting extremely strong demand for the new Outlander-consumers are coming into dealerships asking specifically for the vehicle."
For more information on Mitsubishi Motors, please visit media.mitsubishicars.com .

About Mitsubishi Motors North America, Inc.
Mitsubishi Motors North America, Inc., (MMNA) is responsible for all research & development, manufacturing, marketing, sales and financial services for Mitsubishi Motors in the United States . MMNA sells sedans and crossovers/SUVs through a network of approximately 380 dealers. MMNA is leading the way in the development of highly-efficient, affordably-priced new gasoline-powered automobiles while using its industry-leading knowledge in battery electric vehicles to develop future EV and PHEV models. For more information, contact the Mitsubishi Motors News Bureau at (888) 560-6672 or visit media.mitsubishicars.com .
